title: My account cannot demote
body:
Ive been sitting G5 for the past several months. Ive been sitting 0 lp and lost about 70 percent more games than won. ive lost 6x sitting on 0 lp. i havent gotten recently into this division. just CANNOT DEMOTE.

i need to demote so i can go back to bronze and bring my lp back to 20+ you guys have fucked me. 9 lp per win 22 per loss. so if i cant demote. than i refuse to play this game anymore. its not a joke. demote me manually or im legit gone. im giving it 2 more losses, if i cant demote. it was fun.

(you have my permission to manually put my account into bronze.)
